base_description: Rectangular black and gray box, medium-sized.
part_description: The object has a main rectangular body with a black front and gray sides. A small, darker square is positioned near the center of the front face.
internal_interaction_description: The darker square on the front face may serve as a panel or button, interacting with the main body to provide functionality. The front and sides are seamlessly connected, suggesting a solid structure with potential internal components housed within the rectangular frame.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, interacting with its environment through stability. The front panel may allow user interaction, possibly through touch or pressure, and the object could connect or align with other similar structures.
